briefTitle: The Efficacy and Safety of Cobitolimod (Kappaproct®) in Chronic Active Treatment Refractory Ulcerative Colitis Patients
officialTitle: A Placebo-controlled, Double-blind, Randomised Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Cobitolimod as an add-on to Current Practice in Chronic Active Treatment Refractory Ulcerative Colitis Patients
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if cobitolimod (former called Kappaproct®) is effective in the treatment of chronic active ulcerative colitis patients not responding to available therapy.
